Sorry I'm taking so long to respond, I'm kinda doing homework here.

::Zardus/DevilDuer::

Zardus nods. "Allright," he says, glancing down at his scanner. He was almost 
done with the femm he had been reprogramming.

He glances down at his scanners again, noting two Maximal signatures about 30 
clicks from the Alliance base.

"There are a two Maximals nearby," he says, sending them the coordinates, 
"You, Bloodystrike, Reptilica, and DevilDuer can go ... investigate them."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer walks on his way to the residential areas as he recieves a 
transmission from Zardus, with the new orders. He turns back to Treadshot.

"Hey, I got a mission to do, wanna come along?"
